#Advanced Usage Guide 

= Introduction =

This is Kids Place API Advanced Usage Guide. You need to set up your project as describe in [http://code.google.com/p/kidsplace-api-samples/#basic_setup basic setup] before using all the features described here.

If you have any question or comment regarding ACRA, post a message on the [http://groups.google.com/group/kids-place-sdk-group Discussion Group].


= Details =

Add your content here.  Format your content with:
  * Text in *bold* or _italic_
  * Headings, paragraphs, and lists
  * Automatic links to other wiki pages
